title: WTB: N172 Art Whitney with Dog
author: ngrow9

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Art Whitney with Dog
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to buy an Old Judge N172 Art Whitney with dog card.  I'm hoping to pick one up for a reasonable price, and thus would prefer an ungraded, low grade copy.  I'm willing to accept some wear and tear, so long as the image itself is in fairly good shape.  

If anyone has one they are looking to sell, please let me know.
